analysis.description:

	- secret % 5 == 0

DrainMe.firstTarget should be constant (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16057.sol#14)
DrainMe.secondTarget should be constant (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16057.sol#15)
